description: This file defines a React functional component 'SpeciesLayout' that provides a layout for species-related pages, including navigation tabs, a chatbot interface, and nested routing via react-router.

methods.name: SpeciesLayout
methods.description: React functional component that renders species navigation tabs, a chat widget, and nested routes.

methods.name: send
methods.description: Function to handle sending messages in the chat, appending user message and simulating bot response.

calls: prev => [...prev, { role: 'bot', text: 'Action queued. Use quick actions below.' }]
